content:
747 
 
    (xxvii) UNN accepts UTME requirements plus 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Government, or History and 
Mathematics.  
(xxviii) GOUU accepts  
(a) For Business Administration and Marketing, 'O' level credit 
pass in Commerce in lieu of Economics.  
(b) For Public Administration five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Government or History or 
Commerce and two (2) other subjects.  
(xxix) UMYUK accepts five (5) 'O' level credit passes or its 
equivalent in English Language, Mathematics, E conomics 
and any other two (2) relevant Social Science subjects at 
not more than two (2) sittings.  
(xxx) RENAISSANCE requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include Mathematics, English Language, Economics or 
Accounting.  
(xxxi) FUNAAB requires two (2) relevant ' O' level credit passes 
from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, 
Government or Geography.  
(xxxii) NDA requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Accounting and two (2) other subjects from 
Commerce, Geography, History, French, Arabic an d 
Government.  
(xxxiii) KSU for Public Administration: five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
in English Language, Mathematics, Government, 
Economics and any other Arts or Social Science subject.  
(xxxiv) AUCHIPOLY-DEG for Business administration requires five 
(5) 'O' level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics 
plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, 
Commerce, Government, Geography and Statistics.  
(xxxv) BENIN  
a. For Insurance 'O' level credit pass in Further 
Mathematics is an advantage.  
b. For Marketing requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes to include English Language, Mathematics, 
Economics and two (2) other subjects at not more than 
two (2) sittings  
(xxxvi) ABUJA for Public Administration requires five (5) 'O' level 
credit passes including English, Mathematics, Government 
or History, Economics or Commerce and any other relevant 
subjects.
